Amazing track. I'm glad David Wise has managed to translate his sound to the modern hardware just fine.
The last console I owned was a NES, but I'll probably buy a Wii U.
Looking forward to this game.

author: Daniel Cardoso

text: I can almost hear some of the old DKC songs mixed in with some new melodies. Welcome back, David Wise.
author: ZachTheZip

text: Welcome back, David Wise. DKCR was my Game of the Year in 2010 so I'm really looking forward to playing this once I get a Wii U. It's good to have Wise back with his great musical range. Be it sad, happy, atmospheric or rocking tracks, they're always full of quality. Hopefully this game's level design is as good as DKCR's.

text: Was it tough choosing a song to upload? I still don't know what my favourite track is yet. Scorch 'N' Torch is so darn catchy.

text: I'm also glad to see David Wise back seeing as I believe his compositions for DKC 2 are probably the best he has ever composed.  I look forward to listening to this awesome soundtrack.  Welcome back, David Wise indeed.
